p: The chemical composition of EOs agreed with Wu et al. [ 25], who stated that PMO mostly composed of monoterpenes and their derivatives. Vasile et al. [ 32] showed previously that the TTO contained both light monoterpenes and numerous sesquiterpenes, which are represented as the main component in 4-terpineol, followed by Alpha-Terpinene and Gamma-Terpinene. These were some of the important constituents of PMO and TTO in our results.
